p: Populations were divided into two main clusters and four sub-clusters, which was confirmed with canonical detection function analysis ( Figure 4B and Table 5): first sub-cluster (Rudan, France 1617, France 1499, Tehran, Dehloran, Moghan, Hamedan, and Spain 1 populations), second sub-cluster (Boyer-Ahmad, Shahr-e-Ray, Mashhad, and Yazdabad populations), third sub-cluster (Rudsar and Rasht populations), and fourth sub-cluster (Ardabil, Kivi, and Spain 2 populations).
